title: Introducing: Henry Jamison
content:
Henry Jamison’s debut track, Real Peach, has been stuck with me over the past couple of weeks – bizarrely in a way as it’s perhaps not the usual sound I’d go for.

There’s a tinge of Americana to the songwriting, a genre which if I’m brutally honest, I usually can’t stand – yet it’s the songwriting and the gorgeously saccharine vocal that really got me hooked. A love song at heart, it’s a stark contrast to his second offering, the more melancholic Through A Glass. Still rooted amongst folk influences, it’s perhaps less immediate, but no less emotive. Check out both tracks below.
